speaker: LEONATO
text: What would you with me, honest neighbor?

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Marry, sir, I would have some confidence

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: with you that decerns you nearly.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Brief, I pray you, for you see it is a busy time

speaker: LEONATO
text: with me.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Marry, this it is, sir.

speaker: VERGES
text: Yes, in truth, it is, sir.

speaker: LEONATO
text: What is it, my good friends?

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Goodman Verges, sir, speaks a little off the

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: matter. An old man, sir, and his wits are not so blunt

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: as, God help, I would desire they were, but, in faith,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: honest as the skin between his brows.

speaker: VERGES
text: Yes, I thank God I am as honest as any man

speaker: VERGES
text: living that is an old man and no honester than I.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Comparisons are odorous. Palabras, neighbor

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Verges.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Neighbors, you are tedious.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: It pleases your Worship to say so, but we

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: are the poor duke’s officers. But truly, for mine

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: own part, if I were as tedious as a king, I could find

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: in my heart to bestow it all of your Worship.

speaker: LEONATO
text: All thy tediousness on me, ah?

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Yea, an ’twere a thousand pound more

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: than ’tis, for I hear as good exclamation on your

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Worship as of any man in the city, and though I be

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: but a poor man, I am glad to hear it.

speaker: VERGES
text: And so am I.

speaker: LEONATO
text: I would fain know what you have to say.

speaker: VERGES
text: Marry, sir, our watch tonight, excepting your

speaker: VERGES
text: Worship’s presence, ha’ ta’en a couple of as arrant

speaker: VERGES
text: knaves as any in Messina.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: A good old man, sir. He will be talking. As

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: they say, “When the age is in, the wit is out.” God

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: help us, it is a world to see!—Well said, i’ faith,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: neighbor Verges.—Well, God’s a good man. An two

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: men ride of a horse, one must ride behind. An

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: honest soul, i’ faith, sir, by my troth he is, as ever

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: broke bread, but God is to be worshiped, all men

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: are not alike, alas, good neighbor.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Indeed, neighbor, he comes too short of you.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Gifts that God gives.

speaker: LEONATO
text: I must leave you.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: One word, sir. Our watch, sir, have indeed

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: comprehended two aspicious persons, and we

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: would have them this morning examined before

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: your Worship.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Take their examination yourself and bring it

speaker: LEONATO
text: me. I am now in great haste, as it may appear unto

speaker: LEONATO
text: you.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: It shall be suffigance.

speaker: LEONATO
text: Drink some wine ere you go. Fare you well.

speaker: MESSENGER
text: My lord, they stay for you to give your

speaker: MESSENGER
text: daughter to her husband.

speaker: LEONATO
text: I’ll wait upon them. I am ready.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Go, good partner, go, get you to Francis

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Seacoal. Bid him bring his pen and inkhorn to the

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: jail. We are now to examination these men.

speaker: VERGES
text: And we must do it wisely.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: We will spare for no wit, I warrant you.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Here’s that shall drive some of them to a noncome.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Only get the learned writer to set down our excommunication

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: and meet me at the jail.
